page.title: 12HOME FARM CARAVAN PARK
page.content: HOME FARM IS SITUATED WITHIN A MILE OF JUNCTION 22 ON THE M5 MOTORWAY. IT IS A NEW SITE.SOME FORTEEN ACRES OF LAND HAVE BEEN DEVELOPED AND IN THIS WORK A MILE AND A HALF OF ROADS HAVE BEEN PROVIDED,SERVICES HAVE BEEN LAID ON AND DRAINAGE IMPROVED. SPECIALISED BUILDINGS,TOILET BLOKES HAVE BEEN BUILT AND SHOPS,AMUSEMENT ARCADES AND LEISURE FACILITIES HAVE BEEN PROVIDED.IN ADDITION TO TOURING CARAVANS,TENTING SPACES ARE AVAILABLE AND CARAVAN CLUBS ARE CATERED FOR.THERE IS A WELL EQUIPED CHILDRENS PLAY AREA,A FISHING AREA AND A CLUB HOUSE. THIS SUMMER,FOR THE FIRST TIME,A LARGE MARQUEE HAS BEEN ERECTED TO PROVIDE A FUN AREA FOR VISITORS. THE SITE IS BECOMING INCREASINGLY POPULAR.
